channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat Certificate System 10.4 EUS for RHEL-8
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat Certificate System 10.4 EUS for RHEL-8

item.title: CVE-2023-4727|2024-07-09T11:13:43.833Z -- red%20hat -- red%20hat%20certificate%20system%2010.4%20eus%20for%20rhel-8
item.description: A flaw was found in dogtag-pki and pki-core. The token authentication scheme can be bypassed with a LDAP injection. By passing the query string parameter sessionID=*, an attacker can authenticate with an existing session saved in the LDAP directory server, which may lead to escalation of privilege.
